website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for a mechanical beam scale with high marks for accuracy and mobility.
pros: Scale comes with a larger-than-average platform for individuals with bigger feet
Beam scale moves in 20-pound increments for finer weight readings
cons: Instructions are difficult to read since they only include diagrams of the scale

customer_reviews.title: Another product from CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are illustrations with no text. Customer care lacks any sense of urgency. I tested scale with a verified 257 pound weight. The scale claimed it was 287 pounds. There is no customer adjustment to be made. Needs factory expertise and tools. Refunds are quick, painless and readily available. Was offered a replacement. but they could not guarantee that one wouldn't be the same. The sea team lacks physical ownership, they have orders fulfilled by drop-shipping them. This is no weigh (pun) to run a business.
customer_reviews.author: nhoj odarroc

customer_reviews.title: Still haven't figured out how to install the height rod
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very difficult to put together. My office assistant threw away the box right after we got the scale out otherwise I would have returned this product. We have not been able to figure out to install the height rod. The sliding scale for measuring weight is very difficult to move. I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, works well
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical upon purchase because the price was so fair compared to other scales we looked at. I work in a doctors office and we needed something that had a high capacity. This scale does not disappoint. No issues so far, pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a vacuum cleaner because it
customer_reviews.text: I hate this scale. I tried everything to get it to give the same weight two times in a row. Each time I step on it it shows a different weight and you can move the sliding weights for about 3 lbs and the pointer does not move. Yes I adjusted the bent rod and still. It does suck more than my vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, accurate and very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This scale is awesome. Accurate and consistent every time. Having a residual visual aid reminds you of your progress; or lack thereof. Assembly was very easy. All you need to do is is put the scale on its side and place the hook in the loop. There is only one, obvious way to hook it up and the fit is perfect. I didn't attach the height bar because I didn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hannum

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: No zero for balance beam, and the instructions were very poor. You have to level two parts on the scale instead of having a zero balance point. It also had screws included that it didn't tell you how to use. It went back.
customer_reviews.author: Thefirefly

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and worked right out of the box. I expected trouble from the reviews that I read, however I didn't have to do anything other than assemble. It was upright and operational in less than 15 minutes. It was also calibrated with no need for adjustment. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Haight

customer_reviews.title: Second time around
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scale and found the beam was angled so far toward the rear of scale that the friction prevented the beam from moving freely. Contacted tech support at Seca and received a phone call within minutes of my e-mail. They said the unit was defective and to let Amazon know. Amazon sent a return label and a replacement overnight at no charge. The new scale works flawlessly! The fit and finish of this scale is very good and would have given it five stars, except for the return. I've used Amazon for many years, and am very satisfied with their customer service. I'm very pleased with the end result of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CatWrangler

customer_reviews.title: ACCURATE AND CONSISTENT - and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got so sick of my step-on bathroom scale. The thing would be off by 2 or 3 lbs within minutes. Step on, you're one weight. Step on 5 minutes later and you're another weight. I was always wondering what my real weight was, even if it showed the same weight twice in a row...was that my actual weight? Maybe I'm anal, but I like an exact measurement that will be the same no matter how many times I step on the scale. This scale is fantastic. My husband put it together in about 15 - 20 minutes, but then, he's the mechanical one. I'm just enjoying the scale everyday. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Little Mom

customer_reviews.title: Almost every part was missing..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even know... the product came missing almost every screw, nut and piece to put it together. Very perplexing.
customer_reviews.author: BigLongman

customer_reviews.title: Tells the Truth
customer_reviews.text: Well we don't like what the scale is telling us about our weight but we are working on that issue. The device is accurate and easy to use. It does require some assembly. The assembly instructions were a bit confusing but I was able to figure it out. The device arrived on time and was adequately packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this scale
customer_reviews.text: The first scale I was shipped gave the wrong weight by several pounds. I received a warranty replacement and it would not function at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scale, every time I go to get a physical I step on it on the way out the door so as to compare it to what the doctors scale says, and it's always less than a half pound difference. It's well made and I would buy it again if I didn't already have it.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P.

customer_reviews.title: I like the scale
customer_reviews.text: I like the scale. Too bad the height rod is not mounted in the back so it would be out of the way. The current design with the height rod in the front made me discard it completely.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale for home use, I now have a nicer scale than my doctor. This scale was purchased because I'm at a point where a change in lifestyle is necessary. I wanted to be serious about losing weight and an accurate scale was a necessity. My old step on home scale was off by 10 pounds, to the light side. I've been using the scale now for about 6 months and it's a great scale that will easily last me a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: Seca Balance Beam Scale
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to assemble, nothing would go together. Then I read the instructions...it was dramatically easier after that. The only problem is the balance is so fine it take a long time to settle down.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a scale I can trust! Some assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a scale I can trust! Some assembly required, but I'm an old lady, and if I can do it, anybody can.
customer_reviews.author: Mudfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Complete piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of crap I have ever ordered anywhere.. Junk.. Amazon and mfr should be embarrassed to ship garbage like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W.

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged !!
customer_reviews.text: Received this and it is damaged. The top piece is meant to balance with the far end in a guide. The entire top piece wobbles so the far end rubs in the guide. This scale is HUGE! I wanted bigger for better quality but I was shocked at how big it really is. I didn't get better quality and now I have to figure out how to return this monster.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Professional Home Scale
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and easy to assemble, but mine arrived with a corner of package torn. UPS told I have to examine the product for damage before UPS would return it. I opened and assembled the scale everything was intact except the main rod holding the scale had scratches around the screw holes telling me this product was definitely a USED one or a RETURN from another customer. I bought it through Amazon from Healthcheck Systems Inc. Not happy about it, but scale works great and it is too much effort to take it apart and put it back in a damaged package, so I've kept and use it.
customer_reviews.author: bj2006

customer_reviews.title: King of scales
customer_reviews.text: This does a top notch job in the corner of our bathroom and easy to read results. Hyper accurate and leaves no doubt about what you weigh that day. Built like a tank and it is very large, so it may not fit everyones style, but it should last several generations.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Champion

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Scale was just what we were looking for. Very accurate and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT scale; bad directions
customer_reviews.text: This Seca balance beam scale is the second one in our family as my daughter bought one earlier this year. The seller was as expected. I think it will last indefinitely as the mechanism is all fairly simple once you get the set point right. The directions however were daunting as there were no written directions just drawings. I finally however was able to figure it out and put it together but I am a more mechanically oriented female than some. If you are challenged mechanically, you may need help with assembly but it is a great scale.
customer_reviews.author: tl

customer_reviews.title: I can weigh myself
customer_reviews.text: I weigh over 475 and wanted to start to lose weight. Because of my size going to the doctor weekly was really hard. I bought this scale and I can use it at home. It is accurate (compared to my doctor's) and was very easy to put together. I would recommend to anyone to buy this. I don't know that it is good enough for a doctor's office, but I do know that it's great for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scale. Well packed, easy to assemble and incredibly accurate. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Craig Aylsworth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale, very accurate! Wish I had purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, simple calibration, extremely sturdy. Just a good product all the way around. will work great in company gym.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent scale for family use. Very accurate. Well made. Buying another because the ex took it with her.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: ACCURATE!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scale. It will detect minute differences such as weighing before and after a shower, the latter resulting in moisture absorbed into body hairs and a weight increase. Unlike my "digital" scale (the only things that's digital is the readout, otherwise it's the same old mechanics) I don't "lose" or "gain" three or four pounds in a day, or even in a few minutes! If you want to keep track of your weight in an accurate manner, this is the item to get!
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wrestlers that always need an accurate weight. Matches the gym scale exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Seca is a good scale!
customer_reviews.text: I am a old time Scaleman 40 years of selling and servicing all types of scales, Seca is a good scale!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Shiroma

customer_reviews.title: A cruel but fair master
customer_reviews.text: A cruel but fair master. I'm not sure how accurate or how precise it is, but it is very consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzle

customer_reviews.title: excellent item.
customer_reviews.text: excellent item... I had to give helper at this facility &30 to put it together, I would hope that Amazon, would at least split it with me ^& refund to me $15.00 HA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy D.

customer_reviews.title: great scale, great price
customer_reviews.text: was going to go elsewhere for a scale from the same company but 400 lb. capacity, then decided to try amazon to see what they had. this one is great, it's very sturdy. there is some assembly, but it's not horrible. only problem was the bar that attaches for height measurements. i never did get that installed correctly, but i don't need it anyway, so it didn't matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Good scale. Slightly too precise as takes a while ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Good scale. Slightly too precise as takes a while to get weight
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Rivera-Casamento

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to assemble We have confidence in it, unlike our previous scales, which we could never quite believe.
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble, has a nice design. We have confidence in it, unlike our previous scales, which varied significantly from day to day, so that we could never quite believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S. Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale!
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the doctors office. I've always wanted a balance scale and now I own one. A good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: G. Kirschner

customer_reviews.title: a very good scale
customer_reviews.text: very accurate - more reliable then the digital or mechanical scales - would recommend if you need to keep tabs on your weight
customer_reviews.author: rosamunde

customer_reviews.title: Just as new for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Scale arrived promptly and shipping was free! How great is that! Eazy to assemble with aid of son in law. Works great and is accurate to with in 1/8 of a pound. Top notch supplier shop with confidence here.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter100

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The scale is excellent fior our practice. This is the second one we purchase for another location. We Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amed1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5, but the directions came in a different language---I had to figure out the assembly by reviewing the pictures..
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Seca 700 Physician's Scale
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd not even wasted my time on this. The scales went together very easy even though the directions aren't in english. Once together I noticed the beam was crooked. It is rubbing on the indication end and doesn't move freely. It isn't worth the money compared to the other scales listed. Should have known when it's made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Biggest piece of s***!!
customer_reviews.text: Received as a Christmas present and was purchased based on the reviews versus other models. First it takes forever to get "level" and then when you check to see if it truly is "level" it's NOT! Off by 50 pounds! No matter what we did it would not correct. Said my 150 pound son was over 200 and that a 15 pound weight was 65. Ridiculous! Do not waste your money. Usually I rave about German made products. This one truly stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wyland

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I own a gym and we purchased this back in September of 2011. It hasn't worked since day one and I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good clinic scale. Max out at 500 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: The scale arrived in a styrofoam packed box. Easy to put together. I'll comment on this review if anything happens over time with use but in the meantime it's a great replacement to a previous scale I had in my clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: This is an update after two years..
customer_reviews.text: I have had my SECA balance-beam scale for over two years. I purchased it to precisely measure the effects of my diet as I was in the process of losing twenty pounds. I have It in my bedroom which is carpeted. To eliminate the possibility of the carpet causing errors, I placed it on a square platform made of crisscrossed flooring boards. This is a well-made piece of equipment. Easy to track your daily weight. Forget those on-the-floor digital scales. They show big variations of weight from hour to hour. The beam-balance scales are not even affected by the position of the moon in its orbit.
customer_reviews.author: offthegrid

customer_reviews.title: Eh . . .
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with missing components, will not calibrate or work properly as the top level sticks. Have gone to website, called tech support, no answer. Left message, no return call. Emailed, no response from Seca in any way what so ever. Can someone please advise? I need tech support or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hataway

customer_reviews.title: Finally, an accurate scale!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a scale that is accurate! Easy to assemble, and it beats the guesswork of the digital scales! This balance beam scale is consistent and doesn't change every time you get on it...unlike the digital scales. If you're seriously trying to lose weight and you want an accurate reading, this scale is for you! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Missing part. Amazon Prime to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: Great price but scale arrived missing a critical part. Amazon Prime refunded my money and, due to the cumbersome nature of the item, did not ask for the scale to be returned. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tribal Elder

customer_reviews.title: Bad scale for medical use
customer_reviews.text: This scale break down last week, it is used not even one year yet!!
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: YES.... this is Very Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who says this scale isn't accurate....... they haven't set it up correctly. This fits together in about 5 to 10 minutes and is easy to zero with the turn of a screw. I am happy with this purchase. The base platform on the scale is also better than what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Starz

customer_reviews.title: Has worked fine for years
customer_reviews.text: Has worked fine for years. Its only flaws are that it takes up space and it tells the truth.
customer_reviews.author: William Alan Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Yes this scale is expensive, but if you want something that is reliable whenever you step on it you can't go wrong here. The build quality is great, its accurate, and it was not too hard to put together, thought I would recommend having someone with you to help as some parts of construction having an extra person can be helpful. Overall a very high quality scale and I would recommend for anyone who is tired of inaccurate digital scales.
customer_reviews.author: R. Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale
customer_reviews.text: I should first comment that the scale came without assembly or calibration instructions (actually it came with instructions, but for a different Seca product altogether). We were able to figure out how to assemble/calibrate it, but it was more time-consuming than it needed to be. Having said that, it's essentially what we were looking for in a scale. It's easy to calibrate, seems very accurate, and with luck it should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: The accuracy is good and consistant
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this long enough to say that it is built well and we expect it to last a long time. The accuracy is good and consistant.
customer_reviews.author: Just another amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very well made. We've been toying with the idea of getting a "quality" scale for a long time...meanwhile, I was buying $40-50 scales every couple of years. We finally decided to take the plunge and are so glad we did! You won't be disappointed with this one...worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Balance Beam Scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly excellent scale. It accurately measures our weights, giving the same numbers as measured in our doctor's office, to the half pound. The old little round scale on the floor was terribly inaccurate. For a weight loss program, this scale is a pleasure to use. However, you have got to be pretty clever to assemble it ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seca 700 Physician's Balance Beam Scale
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, well made, more solidly built than the beam scales you've seen in Dr's offices or hospitals, and only minor tweak with a screw driver to balance once assembled. Yes, you need to space to put it somewhere. But if you want to find out what you really weigh, there simply is no substitute for a well made beam scale like this. In short, this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: jeff russell

customer_reviews.title: The Sensible Seca Scale
customer_reviews.text: The Seca 700 Beam Balance Scale provides the accuracy and repeatability needed for serious monitoring of gains and losses. Make sure you have your morning coffee after you're A.M weigh-in else you will record an additional 1/4 pound. It really is that accurate. Perfect for monitoring weight changes, well constructed to provide years of accurate readings for small and large folks alike.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for heavier dieters
customer_reviews.text: Hubby approaches 300# and I'm over 200. Our digital scare will vary by 7-9# on any given day. I knew an "old school" balance beam scale was the only way to accurately track our weight loss. It's pricey, but confirmed accuracy at each doctor appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SCALE!
customer_reviews.text: This mechanical scale is better than any digital scale I've tried. My spouse and child use it, too. (My child loves the height rod!) The scale is accurate to 1/4 of a pound. It was extremely easy to assemble. We are DELIGHTED with this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: They look good, easy to put together and I trust balanced ...
customer_reviews.text: They look good , easy to put together and I trust balanced weights over springs anytime !
customer_reviews.author: Sam Howell

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our Corporate Fitness Center
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy to put together and set up. Up and running in our new facility within 20 minutes. Looks like the ones in the Doctor's office, just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JParizona

customer_reviews.title: Weighing In
customer_reviews.text: The scale met my expectations for the most part. It is a bit difficult to get the weight measure exact, but it seems to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Judy

customer_reviews.title: accurate and consistant
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several electronic scales over the years and have been disappointed with every one of them . This scale is easy to use , easy to read and we love it . The only drawback , is that it tells the truth . We would enthusiastically recommend this product to a friend .
customer_reviews.author: jwl

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me. Got it home and ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Got it home and set it up correctly but could never get it to give me a proper weight. I returned it immediately. Be warned, there are a lot of pieces with setting this up so getting everything in place and working correctly can be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Wendel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality but does read 2 lbs higher than actual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and everything it was supposed to be and more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: After having had several types of scales ,which have over time proved to be inaccurate ,I decided to purchase a physician's scale like my doctor's. I am just finishing a 6 week HCG diet cure protocol where I need to weigh myself daily. This scale s very accurate and I am glad I made the investment.I also lost 20 Lbs. in 6 weeks..
customer_reviews.author: N. Anthony Werner

customer_reviews.title: And now to start the diet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely constructed scale. The installation diagrams were a challenge to understand. Plan on 2 people to put it together. Unfortunately, I have a ceramic tile floor in the bathroom which made the balancing a bit hard. I used a level. The scale seems to measure about a pound lite, but that may be due to it being a part of a degree off level. Did not install the height measure as I didn't want to watch my height decrease as I grow older!
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: scale-Docotrs Type
customer_reviews.text: This is the scale I have been looking for since my antique one broke. Thank Amazon for carrying such a variety of scales and everything else. I am so happy.I have purchased other things and never had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Acurate and professional
customer_reviews.text: Accurate which is much needed in a scale and height rod. Researched and this brand and style worked best for my needs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Chafian

customer_reviews.title: seca balance beam scale
customer_reviews.text: The Seca beam scale works as specified. I had an electronic scale prior to this. The electronic scale was a whole lot cheaper and was as accurate if not more so than Seca. Questions sent to Seca on Web never get answered. I am not disappointed in the product, but could have saved my money and stuck to an electronic scale. Not everything bigger is better.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rieder

product_meta.title: seca 700 - Mechanical Column Scale with Eye-Level Beam
product_meta.description: With a capacity of 500 lbs, the seca 700 mechanical column scale is an ideal solution for weighing overweight patients. This is due partly to the generously proportioned, low platform. The slip resistant cast iron base and anti-tip column design also allows patients to be safely measured and weighed. The scale is printed on both sides, allowing both patient and nurse to read the weight.
feature_bullets: Built in transport castors for easy mobility
The optional measuring rod with a range from 23.62 to 78.73 inches for time-saving weighing and measuring in one step

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
